增六五和弦（絃）: chord of the augmented sixth and fifth

增二和絃: chord of the augmented sixth and second

增四三和弦（絃）: chord of the augmented sixth fourth and third

六五和絃，六五三和弦: chord of the sixth fifth and third

四二和弦（絃）；二和弦（絃）: chord of the sixth fourth and second

四三和弦，六四三和弦: chord of the sixth fourth and third

增四三和弦: chord of the sugmented sixth fourth and third

左手: Linke Hand {Ger.} {= L.H.}; main gaunche {Fr.} {= m.g.}

國際現代音樂協會: Société Internationale pour la Musique Contemporaine (SIMC) {Fr.}
